items.content_html: QuickUI is a lightweight frontend framework. Supports data binding, i18n support, event binding, conditional rendering, and loop rendering. Helps developers quickly build efficient and flexible web.

items.content_html: FlexPlyr is a modular player that supports YouTube, Vimeo, as well as local video and audio files. It allows customization of control button types, arrangement, and optional panel styles.
items.title: pardnchiu/FlexPlyr: FlexPlyr is a modular player that supports YouTube, Vimeo, as well as local video and audio files. It allows customization of control button types, arrangement, and optional panel styles.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that fills form fields with realistic random data using Chance.js. Click a button to generate and populate input fields, including names, emails, dates, and more, directly on the active tab. Simple, efficient, and customizable for developers and testers.
items.title: bdahnaf/ChanceFiller: A lightweight Chrome extension that fills form fields with realistic random data using Chance.js. Click a button to generate and populate input fields, including names, emails, dates, and more, directly on the active tab. Simple, efficient, and customizable for developers and testers.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable toast notification library for React Native. This library provides pre-defined toasts, such as success, error, and loading, along with custom and emoji options. Users can display toast messages anywhere in their app without wrapping the entire app in a provider.
items.title: muku534/react-native-toast: A lightweight and customizable toast notification library for React Native. This library provides pre-defined toasts, such as success, error, and loading, along with custom and emoji options. Users can display toast messages anywhere in their app without wrapping the entire app in a provider.
